txt.en: 'I see you had some luck at the keg-races! Allow me to be the first to bid you congratulations on your excellent luck, [placeholder]. Here is your reward.'
'I'm feeling fiesty!'
'You think Kolmar's your dwarf? Well then, hand me one of your Festival Tickets, and I'll jot down your wager on him.\n\n'Good luck, [placeholder]!'
Keg-hopping Race: Kolmar's Credulity
'Sorry, [placeholder]. I'm afraid you'll need a Festival Ticket in order to select a contestant.\n\n'Jorfi is handing out tickets just here...I'd go see him right away!'
You have selected Kolmar as your favourite to win
'Watch the race, [placeholder]! How do you think Kolmar will make out?'
The race has begun! Betting is now closed
'I'm feeling awfully neutral today!'
Kolmar has won the race!

Tickets for the race can be picked up at Jorfi at the Keg-hopping race. Tokens can be turned in to place a wager.\n\nYou will need to hand over a Festival Ticket in order to select Kolmar as your favourite to win.
Kolmar has lost the race
The Keg-hopping Race begins soon on this very track.\n\nYou have guessed that Kolmar will win the race, and you should observe whether or not this comes to pass.
Kolmar has lost the race
Arnar can be found in the Keg-race area during the Summer Festival.\n\nYou should speak with Arnar and collect the bountiful prize he has to offer for your excellent luck.
Kolmar has lost the race
You have left the race area
Turn in a Festival Ticket to select Kolmar
Observe the race to see if Kolmar is victorious
Talk to Arnar
Do not leave the race area
'I'm worn out....'
You have a vested interest in Kolmar's success as he runs the Summer Festival Keg-hopping Race.

'Well, [placeholder], good day to you! It is often said that there is nothing better than fine summer weather, though it is a little balmy for my taste this time of year. I am sweltering where I stand!

'These lazy summer days can drag on, which is why we look forward to the Festival events! This year, inhabitants of Thorin's Hall are racing to finish the Keg-hopping Race event as quickly as possible. If you want to know a secret, I think I know who is fastest....

'I believe Kolmar is a sure thing this year. A friend of mine saw him down a whole keg, then keep right on dancing! Would you like to support Kolmar? I would, if I were you.'
